tldr: Vulnerable versions lack adequate protections to prevent multiple failed authentication attempts within a short time frame, making them more vulnerable to brute force attacks. The updated version introduces an optional rate-limiting login endpoint to help mitigate brute force password guessing attacks.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version which is within vulnerability ranges and if your workflow tool is accessible from outside your network or if you are not using 2FA.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `n8n` library to the patch version.
vulnerable_to: Improper Restriction of Excessive Authentication Attempts
